snippet: This summer, images by dozens of American artists will be plastered on 50,000 outdoor displays from billboards to bus shelters in an initiative to create a vast outdoor art exhibition.
abstract: Images by dozens of famous American artists will occupy 50,000 outdoor displays from electronic billboards to bus shelters in summer 2014; are part of initiative by leading museums and Outdoor Advertising Association of America to create one of the largest outdoor art exhibitions seen in the country and revive billboard industry.
lead_paragraph: This summer, images by dozens of American artists will be plastered on 50,000 outdoor displays from billboards to bus shelters in an initiative to create a vast outdoor art exhibition.

headline.main: Look Up! All Signs Point to Art
headline.print_headline: Look Up! All Signs Point to Art
